name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Groupwise - Facebook Group Admin Automation Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facebook group admin tool for automated member data collection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Groupwise is a tool to automate the process of collecting information and data from prospective users in the member requests page (name, Facebook URL, email, and the required questions/answered).

We found that all the existing tools were bloated and confusing with a lot of unnecessary features, so we stripped all of that away to be able to provide a better tool that is extremely simple to use, and just works without a lot of hassle or confusion.
